Topic.Title: New to Squiffy (font and attributes question)

Posts.EditableText:
Hi I'm new to Squiffy. I have a question.

1. Is it possible to change the font color of the text (not the passage/section)?
2. How do I change the font color of the text if it's possible?
3. How to bold and/or underline text?

So if normal text color can be changed then changing the color of passage/section/link can be changed as well right? So here's my question...

1. How do I change the color of the link/section? Can they have different font color? (passage/passage different font color) or (section/section different font color) or (passage/section different font color)?
2. Is it possible to have a description when the house hovers the link text? If so, how do I do that?

Last question. Sorry if I have so many questions. It's about attributes this time.
If for example I have health, how do I keep it on top of while the player plays?

Thank you!

Yep, yo can do all that stuff. But you need to manually change the css style sheet of your index.html. Or make a js function that do the same on runtime. 
For further info you can consider this: https://www.w3schools.com/css/
